word_mean: 变量：在数学上指代表一个任意数或任意集合元素的符号
variable-head variable-area flowmeter 差压和面积都允许改变以得到宽范围度的一种流量计。

sentence.Network_en: The drill has variable speed control.
The variable weather is a great trial to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种多变的天气真是让我受不了.

sentence.Network_en: He is of a variable mood ; he never finishes what he starts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这个人朝三暮四,做起事来总是虎头蛇尾.

list.abs: 电脑常用英语单词 ... External security 外部安全性 environment variable 环境变量 fax modem 传真猫.
局部变量（Local Variable）是指作用域和生命周期都局限在所在函数或过程范围内的变量，它是相对于全局变量（Global variable） …
随机变量(Random Variable)随机变量是指变量的值无法预先确定仅以一定的可能性(概率)取值的量。它是由于随机而获得的非确定值,是概率中的一个基本概念。在经济活动.
项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Variable 变量 Variable Cost 可变成本 Variables 变量.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin variabilis, from variare (see vary)

encyclopedia.content: 英语单词 a.易变的，多变的 The weather here isvariable 这里天气反复无常。 2. 可变的 The speed of the toy boat is variable. 玩具船的速度是可变的。 3. 生变异的；畸变的4. 数变量的n.[C]1. 可变物，易变物；可变因素 We should take all the variables into account when we make a plan. 我们制订计划时应该把所有的可变因素考虑进去。 2. 数变量 Temperature and rainfall are variables. 气温和降雨量是变量。VHDL数据

entry.tran: 多变的;易变的;反复无常的
entry.def: Something that is variable changes quite often, and there usually seems to be no fixed pattern to these changes.

example.ex: The potassium content of foodstuffs is very variable...
example.tran: 食物中钾的含量差别很大。

example.ex: There was a bit of a wind and it was blowing  onshore, variable, but quite strong.
example.tran: 有一阵风朝岸上吹来，风向变化不定，但风力很强。

entry.def: A variable is a factor that can change in quality, quantity, or size, which you have to take into account in a situation.

example.ex: Decisions could be made on the basis of price, delivery dates, after-sales service or any other variable...
example.tran: 购买决定可能会基于价格、送货日期、售后服务以及其他可变因素。

example.ex: Other variables in making forecasts for the industry include the weather and the general economic climate.
example.tran: 对该产业进行预测时还要考虑天气和宏观经济环境等其他不确定因素。

entry.def: A variable is a quantity that can have any one of a set of values.

example.ex: It is conventional to place the independent variable on the right-hand side of an equation.
example.tran: 普遍做法是把自变量放在等式的右边。

means.word_mean: 1. something that is likely to vary; something that is subject to variation;

sentences.sentence: "the weather is one variable to be considered"

means.word_mean: 2. a quantity that can assume any of a set of values
3. a star that varies noticeably in brightness
4. a symbol (like x or y) that is used in mathematical or logical expressions to represent a variable quantity
1. liable to or capable of change;

sentences.sentence: "rainfall in the tropics is notoriously variable"

means.word_mean: 3. (used of a device) designed so that a property (as e.g. light) can be varied;

sentences.sentence: "variable filters in front of the mercury xenon lights"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有多种形态的, 形状不同的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vari变化+form形状→有多种形状,形状不同的
vari变化+able……的→易变的;可变的;变量的
vari变化+ous……的→adj.各种各样的;不同的
variegate弄出杂色+ion表名词→n.彩色斑驳
vari变化+able……的→易变的;可变的;变量的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 变化, 多样性, 种种, 品种, 种类
stems_affixes.word_buile: vari变化+ety表名词→n.变化, 多样性, 种种, 品种, 种类
vari变化+eg=ag+ate表动词→做出变化→弄出杂色
pre预先+vari变化+cate=ate表动词→预先想好了变化之词→说谎

Sentence.sentence: What we have to do is make sure we know what these are and take into account all the possible variables
And at the vast majority of places, it is simply not a big variable in the college's decision-making process.

means.word_mean: 变化的, 可变的, 易变的，多变的，变化无常的

sentences.en: The variable weather is a great trial to me.
sentences.cn: 这种多变的天气真是让我受不了。

sentences.en: The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable.
sentences.cn: 汽车挡风玻璃上雨刷的速度是可变的。

sentences.en: Our team's performance this year has been variable.
sentences.cn: 我们队今年成绩很不稳定。

means.word_mean: 可变因素; 变数；可变情况；变量

sentences.en: Have you taken all the variables into account in your calculations?
sentences.cn: 在你的计算中有没有把所有的可变因素都考虑进去?

sentences.en: Speed was a variable in the experiment.
sentences.cn: 在该实验中速度是个变数。

jushi.english: The variable weather is a great trial to me.
jushi.chinese: 这种多变的天气真是让我受不了。

jushi.english: The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable.
jushi.chinese: 汽车挡风玻璃上雨刷的速度是可变的。
